Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: i save a lot of time with AI at my disposal. i don't have to travel to use AI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: i can use ai in my own time not rushed. it is also hard to understand people as a highly visual learner.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: teachers can point you in the right direction and see where you are lacking whereas using AI is limited to your understanding.
